name: Global Token Cash
description: GTC COIN With Assets swap, businesses are able to create, manage, and distribute branded virtual and physical cards while GTC manages all the regulatory, compliance, and network responsibilities to quickly launch your program with our banking partners and direct licenses. Assets swap connects and is partnered with major payment networks to enable businesses to rapidly create cryptocurrency to fiat funded card programs. Swipe Ramps enables a full fiat channel for payments into and out of any asset class.
